## Description {#details}

LF&#95;INDEX - Used to chain two large LF&#95;FIELDLIST or LF&#95;METHODLIST records together.

The first will end in an LF&#95;INDEX record that points to the next.

Definition at line 914 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/codeview/typerecord-h">TypeRecord.h</a>.
